author: tomdz
msg: Updated to the build-torque.xml of Torque version 3.0.2 (the previous one was of an older version)
Changed build.xml and build.properties to make use of the new torque properties naming (i.e. starting with torque.)

author: tomdz
msg: Applied dtd fix by Ron Gallagher that fixes dtd error that would only allow one argument for a procedure

author: tomdz
msg: * Cleaned up structure and layout a bit
* Started updating documentation to match the current dtd
* Starting adding <a name=""> tags in order to be able to reference attributes from other documents
